Articles.Content: Hello, Huumons! Jugger G here! I'm a new Kerbonaut who happens to live near Cape Canaveral, so I get to see a launch every few weeks or so! Looking forward to learning the ropes!

I am immediately jealous of every sighting you have ever had.

Welcome aboard!

Welcome to the forums! Though I have only been here for a month, I've been playing this game from the demo version of 0.18.3(I got it when .21 was out) to 0.23.5. so far the experience ive had is wonderful.

Also, watch out for the Kraken and his 8 sons, I've seen them lurking around the forums.
Wow, that title made me think of an insanely awesome idea....SPACE ROLLER COASTER!
